title: 服务器崩溃
author: icebears
txt_content:
qwq具体看下面 服务器开成功了 但是玩家进去就会崩的那种

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// My bad.

Time: 2019-08-13 21:24:38 CST
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/Minecraft

replies.author: GGGGB
replies.txt_content: 你客户端的mod肯定有问题

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 能否提供服务器的崩溃报告

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content: 好像是netherportalfixforge模组在执行玩家登录事件时候出现了问题，不太确定！你可以去除试一下

replies.author: 龙岩是啊
replies.txt_content: 应该是mod冲突问题，你按楼上几位说的试一试，建议主要看看netherportalfixforge

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content: 额外植物学导致的崩溃，建议删除这个mod后再行测试

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 你用的额外植物学(ExtraBotany)怕不是开发构建吧。。。

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content: 将额外植物学（ExtraBotany）更新到最新版本即可：https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... otany/files/2752422
